website_summaries.verdict: The fact that this polish creates a high-gloss shine and can be worn alone or with other polishes make it one of ZOYA's most practical and versatile products available.
pros: An extremely versatile polish that creates a high-gloss finish
Looks beautiful by itself or on top of other ZOYA nail colors
Helps make other polishes last longer when worn as a top coat
cons: Can peel off or have a dull finish if not allowed to dry thoroughly before doing other activities

customer_reviews.title: My nails are healthy now!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have found this brand. My nails were pulling away from my nail beds - ouch! Turns out I must've been allergic to the other brands. Two months after switching to this brand, my nails are healthy, grown out, and looking great. This is not a paid endorsement, I have not received free products to try. I am simply delighted to find a company doing the right thing. Thank you Zoya. ~ Kim Cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Kim

customer_reviews.title: ZOYA protects my nails
customer_reviews.text: The finishing touch! Base coat seals and protects your nail bed. Nail polish with pigment adds the color. This top coat adds a glossy protection over the entire works. ZOYA is one of the few brands that contains no nasty chemicals that leach into your body through the nail bed. So splurge on the price. YOU are worth it. YOU are worth protecting.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why every time I switch a nail polish brand I try the base and top that comes from the same company. I love Zoya polishes but the Naked Manicure line is a big disappointment. The topcoat doesn't give the gloss I'm used to (Sally Hansen Insta-Dri). It doesn't self-level if you apply it even with some minor imperfections. It isn't fast drying. There are way better products.
customer_reviews.author: KateWayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Non toxic, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this stuff. After discovering the new studies of other popular nail polish brands allowing endocrine interruptors into your system in 10-12 hours from putting it on... we searched for a safer alternative. I used 2 base coats and this top coat and it lasted almost a full week!
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: Last 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I love that the Zoya line is free of the 5 chemicals but on fingernails it only lasts about a day before it chips off. Toenails it lasts a long time. So if you have an event and want to paint your nails best if you paint them the night before. Or if you have numbs then you should be okay
customer_reviews.author: D.K

customer_reviews.title: Vegan & works great!
customer_reviews.text: Because Zola is vegan, it does take a good 10 min to dry, and let the polish underneath dry for 10 before you apply. One coat on each nail is perfect for me to get that thick glossy look.
customer_reviews.author: Kris V Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Non-toxic. Loving it. So Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: started using non-toxic nail products. It doesnt have that toxic smell. The less toxicities, the better. I'd buy the colors in this brand in the future. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: ricochet rabbit 212

customer_reviews.title: Terrible seller.
customer_reviews.text: This came covered in nasty cologne. In the package and out. So that means they sprayed it and put it in the box. So gross. The whole point is no smell polish. Revolting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item since I am pregnant and very sensitive to smells. This item might say that it's toxic-free but it has a very very strong smell which makes me wonder how toxic-free it really is! Having said that, the color spreads very nicely on the nails and lasts quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JFK

customer_reviews.title: Great shiny topcoat
customer_reviews.text: I have used Zoya nail polish for 13 years. By far the best.
customer_reviews.author: SAV

customer_reviews.title: Lasts well
customer_reviews.text: Goes on well and lasts very well. Sometimes I touch up the polish on the toes after a week or two but usually not needed for a few weeks even after wearing sandals every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly to a high gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite topcoat ever. It's glossy, has good for your nails ingredients and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Angelcat47

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this on my toes, but so far so good. It dried fast and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: ElleRey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: This polish peeled off the day after I put it on. I waited a couple of months and tried it several times, even over other polish and it would make the other polish come off within a week. I bought a colored polish that I do like and it stays on. Not sure why this one doesn’t?? I would return it but I don’t see that option.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, healthy and safe
customer_reviews.text: I love healthy products that also do a great job. I use all Zoya products on my nails.
customer_reviews.author: dabeeant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Helps polish stay on longer. Love this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes your nails look great and love that it's safer than most nail polishes, but chips in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Zoya is the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only use Zoya nail polish. This top coat is great. Prevents polish from chipping. Keeps nails strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and glossy
customer_reviews.text: Zoya has a great glossy seal top coat it is nice and shiny and helps color stay chip free
customer_reviews.author: AmberG

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: Due to being a cancer survivor, I use ONLY parabin FREE formaldehyde FREE products now and found this sensational for my french as topcoat
customer_reviews.author: Suzyq

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My zoya manicure lasted longer than any other brand I’ve tried. Anyone who said that it peels right off must be using way too much. Just one coat will do!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing top coat. Very shiny and durable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, shiny, long lasting and chip resistant. Order this it is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great shine
customer_reviews.text: This topcoat adds ingredible shine to your nails. I use it after satin seal and again about 1 week after manicure. Make my polish last and last.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Knox

customer_reviews.title: Be your own professional!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect topcoat! Helped my manicure last days longer – – and looked so smooth even with my amateur lack of talent!
customer_reviews.author: T. T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: no protection!
customer_reviews.text: My polish was chipped within hours of applying this top coat. It didn't protect my manicure at all. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Looks and feels like a gel top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Boglioli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels and looks better to use cruelty free, less toxic nail products!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Love Zoya
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how much I love Zoya products. My nails grow beautifully when I use these products !
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: No smear
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time. Didn't smear the polish at all
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a nail polish without harmful chemicals. This applies well and dries fast but does not last long. It peals of very easily. Lasted 2 days only
customer_reviews.author: Marisela Bustillo

customer_reviews.title: Better than OPI
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Now will be permanently switching from OPI to Zoya
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Butterhof

customer_reviews.title: This Polish Peels!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm pregnant and trying to reduce toxins while not losing all of my style. Unfortunately, this polish starts peeling the minute it dries, and it's all peeled off within 24 hours! I was very disappointed! Perhaps the colored polishes have more staying power, but for a clear coat, this is not worth the price or the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: SnowWyte

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try it; however, the bottle was delivered damaged.
customer_reviews.author: LEEANN SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use as clear polish but peels off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: 123bieta

customer_reviews.title: No Strong Odor, Very Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Best part of this top coat is the smell is so small and minor that I dont feel like I'm smelling it all over the place for days and days after applying. That is to say it is not totally scentless as you have to like put your finger right up to your nose to smell a very muted chemical smell but its not like others where even if my hands are away from my face I still am hit with that pungnant odor of very toxic chemicals. Also I love how shiny this is makes even plain nails look very nice and appealing instead of drab and unattractive. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan A. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Zoya has the best line of nail products to me. I don't use anything else . My names stay at least a week once I do them now.
customer_reviews.author: JayefromJersey

product_meta.title: ZOYA Naked Manicure Glossy Seal Top Coat, 0.5 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
The Naked Manicure Glossy Seal is an additional classic finish option for those who prefer a high shine manicure. Apply AFTER the Satin Seal Top Coat for best results. Compatible with all Naked Manicure components and ZOYA Fast Dry (drying drops).

BRAND STORY
Founded in 1986, Zoya focuses on high quality products for professional salons and spas.
